issue.title: [Python] Expose dataset PartitioningFactory.inspect ?
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7649](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7649). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In C++, the PartitioningFactory has a `Inspect` method, which, given a path, will infer the schema. 

We could expose this in Python as well, it could eg be used to easily explore or illustrate what types are inferred from a path (int32, string)
